name: GoTris
description:
GoTris is a combination of Tetris and the board game GO.

The goal of the game is to surround all the white stones with black stones and get as much score as possible before the board fills up. Rows that no longer hinder the player (there are no white stones and no freedoms/holes for the white stones) are removed.

Controls: arrows, ESC, 1, 2, mouse (in menus)

This game is a prototype. 90% of the visuals are created using third-party library Shapes, a great tool but not the best for WebGL builds, so there might be some issues playing in browser.

Scores are not stored between sessions in browser. Download Windows version to keep score.
